---
title: "Accordion - Exclusive Mode"
filters: [details]
---

In exclusive mode (default), only one details element can be open at a time within a group.

## Configuration

```markdown
::: {.details summary="Section 1" group="demo"}
Content for section 1.
:::

::: {.details summary="Section 2" group="demo"}
Content for section 2.
:::
```

## Demo

Click on different sections - the previously open one will close automatically.

::: {.details summary="What is Quarto?" group="faq"}
Quarto is an open-source scientific and technical publishing system built on Pandoc.
:::

::: {.details summary="How do I install Quarto?" group="faq"}
Visit [quarto.org](https://quarto.org) and download the installer for your operating system.
:::

::: {.details summary="Is Quarto free?" group="faq"}
Yes! Quarto is completely free and open-source under the GPL-2 license.
:::

::: {.details summary="What formats does Quarto support?" group="faq"}
Quarto supports HTML, PDF, Word, PowerPoint, ePub, and many more formats.
:::

## Global Configuration

Set the default accordion mode for all groups:

```yaml
---
extensions:
  details:
    interactive:
      accordion-mode: "exclusive"  # This is the default
---
```
